text: Davis is a city in the state of Oklahoma in the United States. The population was 2,823 at the 2020 census. Davis is the home of the 1979, 1986, 1990, and 1995 Oklahoma State Football Championship teams (Runner-up in 1951, 2000, 2003, and 2005). The mascot of Davis Public Schools is the "Wolves." ==References== ==Other websites== * Encyclopedia of Oklahoma History and Culture - Davis Category:Cities in Oklahoma
title: Davis, Oklahoma
